scripts.say: ...Understood. Our rendezvous coordinates are...
There's a message from Kirov. She's successfully joined up with the Eagle Union fleet and is making her way here.
Communication technology in the Mirror Seas? We're going to have look into this.

options.content: Does the Northern Parliament have a way to bypass the Mirror Sea's jamming effect?

scripts.say: Oh? Are you interested in that? Does the Eagle Union perchance not have that technology?
From Prometheus to Goemon, your lives are nasty, brutish, and short.
Who's there?!
An unfamiliar, alien voice rose from the transmission.
I don't remember inviting you barbarous louts to my estate. Crass creatures, stupid beyond comprehension.
I'll say this in a way you idiots will understand. Get the hell out of here!
Overzealous ignoramuses! Boundless greed and avarice!
Yes, begone, thieves in the night! Plunderers! Face destruction and sink by my hand!
The ice walls are closing in around us!
Shoot...! I don't like the looks of this! Everyone, retreat, hurry!
The stronghold stirred like a behemoth given life by the mysterious Siren voice, rough winds and waves forming as sheets of ice deformed and convulsed.
No, the very stronghold - and the entire Mirror Sea - was beginning to move.
We've lost contact with Kirov! These damn Sirens...!
All the Siren forces are congregating around us! Commander, at this rate...

options.content: Our only option is to meet up with the Eagle Union fleet!
Our only option is to fight back right now!

scripts.say: A courageous choice. Heh, in that case, we'll have to muster up the courage to match you!
A calculated decision, Commander. As expected, you've taken stock of the situation quickly.
...Comrades, we have no choice but to fight!
Our lives are in your hands, Commander!
